description:
This interview was recorded with Ḥasan Badr al-Shāhīn, male, born in Jaffa, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع حسن بدر الشاهين، ذكر، ولد في يافا، فلسطين.
contents: Childhood memories and Battles. (@ 0:00)||Expulsion from Jaffa and war events. (@ 16:15)||Cultural life and traditions. (@ 21:3)||Refugee experience and hope of return . (@ 35:11)

description:
The interview was recorded on July 6, 2004 with Fīfī Khūrī, female, born in 1922 in Jaffa, Palestine and resides in al-Ḥamrā, Lebanon. 

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع فيفي خوري في 6 تموز يوليو عام 2004، أنثى، ولدت عام 1922 في يافا، فلسطين وتقيم في الحمرا، لبنان.
contents: Family origins and childhood in Palestine. (@ 0:15)||Education and degrees . (@ 8:1)||Socio-economic life . (@ 27:56)||Social and cultural life. (@ 39:44)||Zionist invasion and psychological warfare . (@ 48:50)||Expulsion from Palestine (@ 69:15)

description:
The interview was recorded on April 14, 2004 with Kāmil Bishārah Qusṭandī, male, born in 1925 in Jaffa, Palestine. He was as a presenter in Idhāʻat al-Sharq al-Adná during the British Mandate.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع كامل بشارة قسطندي في 14 نيسان ابريل عام 2004، ذكر، ولد عام 1925 في يافا، فلسطين. كان مذيعاً في إذاعة الشرق الأدنى خلال الإنتداب البريطاني.
contents: Childhood and education. (@ 0:00)||Cultural life in Palestine before Nakba. (@ 16:37)||Military occupation and exile. (@ 41:38)||Expulsion from Palestine (@ 54:52)||Refugee life . (@ 68:9)

description:
The intrview was recorded on August 2, 2004 with Iftikār Abū Shullayḥ, female, born in 1936 in Jaffa, Palestine and resides in Shātīlā Refugee camp, Lebanon.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع إفتكار أبو شليح في 2 آب أغسطس عام 2004، أنثى، ولدت عام 1936 في يافا، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم شاتيلا للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان.
contents: Social history of the city. (@ 0:00)||Community celebration and traditions. (@ 12:15)||Expulsion and right of return. (@ 30:10)

description:
The interview was recorded on March 25, 2003 with Ramzīyah Muḥammad al-Shanawānī, female, born in 1928 in Jaffa, Palestine. She was a dressmaker.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع رمزية محمد الشنواني في 25 آذار مارس عام 2003، أنثى، ولدت عام 1928 في يافا، فلسطين . كانت خياطة.
contents: Childhood and community life. (@ 0:00)||Traditional Palestinian attire. (@ 14:14)||The city of Jaffa and war-torn society. (@ 26:5)||Marriage and family relations. (@ 39:3)||Wartime and military occupation. (@ 49:26)||Military operations and forced migration. (@ 66:50)||Military occupation, warfare and resistance in Jaffa. (@ 75:3)||Land, defense and revolutionaries. (@ 88:42)||Political turmoil, military occupation and Displacement (@ 104:4)

description:
The interview was recorded on March 13, 2003 with ʻĀ'ishah Saʻīd al-Madʹhūn, female, born in 1929 in Jaffa, Palestine and resides in Beirut (Lebanon), Lebanon.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع عائشة سعيد المدهون في 13 آذار مارس عام 2003، انثى، ولدت عام 1929 يافا، فلسطين
وتقيم في بيروت، لبنان.
contents:
Families, employment and society in Jaffa

. (@ 0:00)||Weddings and ceremonies in Jaffa. (@ 18:21)||Community and family life in Jaffa. (@ 29:48)||Political conditions and revolution. (@ 41:42)||Political hostility and interreligious relations. (@ 54:10)||Palestinian public opinion and political participation. (@ 61:24)||Coercion, fear and exile from Jaffa. (@ 66:26)||Refugees, aid and living conditions. (@ 76:16)

description:
The interview was recorded on July 5, 2004 with Pauline Saʻīd, female, born in 1928 in Jaffa, Palestine and resides in Hamra, Lebanon. She was a teacher.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع بولين سعيد في 5 تموز يوليو عام 2004، أنثى، ولدت عام 1928 في يافا، فلسطين و تقيم في الحمرا، لبنان. كانت مدرّسة.
contents: Childhood, education, and cultural life . (@ 0:23)||Socio-economic conditions and cultural life in Jaffa. (@ 28:25)||Political and socio-economic conditions. (@ 42:28)||Battles and expulsion from Jaffa. (@ 61:34)

description:
The interview was recording with ʻAlī al-Najjār, male, born in Jaffa, Palestine and reides in al-Baddāwī Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon. He worked as a driver with the British Army.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع علي النجار، ذكر، ولد في يافا، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم البداوي للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان. عمل سائقا لدى الجيش البريطاني.
contents: Childhood memories. (@ 0:00)||Description of the city. (@ 9:34)||Political turmoil and Zionist infiltration . (@ 26:1)||War time, military occupation , immigration and refugees. (@ 39:8)||Refugee hope. (@ 57:58)
